page.title: 15MY CLOTHES
page.content: THE SCHOOL UNIFORM IS RED,WHITE AND GREY. AT SCHOOL I WEAR A SUMMER CHECKED DRESS WITH A CHECKED BELT,WHITE OR RED SOCKS AND WHITE SANDALS. IN BED I WEAR AN OLD T-SHIRT, A VERY BIG ONE WITH PINK,BLUE AND GREEN THIN STRIPES. AT THE WEEKEND I WEAR A SUMMER DRESS WITH PINK AND BLUE FLOWERS ON IT. MY BROWNIES UNIFORM IS A BROWN DRESS WITH POCKETS ON IT,A YELLOW TIE,MY PROMISE BADGE,A BROWN BELT AND A BROWN BOBBLE HAT. MY BEST CLOTHES ARE MY WHITE SKIRT,MY YELLOW JUMPER,GREEN-BLUE T-SHIRT AND MY WHITE SANDALS.FASHION DEPENDS VERY MUCH ON THE TASTE OF THE INDIVIDUAL.
